sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Zaporizhia and eastern Ukraine comes under intense shelling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Neutral Switzerland clears the path for arms exports, while South Africa probes allegations of weapon shipments to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: 30 Palestinians dead, while Israel claims to have killed two militant commanders in the worst fighting the Holy Land has seen in months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And Belgium and Albania are through, but Iceland is out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The sound of anti-aircraft sirens ring out in Zaporizhia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian authorities say Russian troops have attacked the region 70 times in the space of 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At least eight people across the Oblast have been injured after intense shelling on residential buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, the Russian Defense Ministry has denied reports of active combat operations in Zaporizhia and Kherson after claims of Ukrainian advances at several points along the front.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Moscow insists it repelled several attacks in the Donetsk direction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This after Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky said the spring counter-offensive would have to wait until more weapons arrive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The EU's top diplomat Joseph Bure said Europe is committed to send more weapons to the embattled country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Switzerland, which has intensively debated arms deliveries to Ukraine, is now opening the door to relaxing its laws on neutrality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Swiss Council's Security Policy Commission has cleared the path for arms exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the US has welcomed Cape Town's promise to investigate allegations of arms shipments to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The US ambassador to South Africa has accused the country of supplying Moscow weapons despite its professed neutrality in the war. President Cyril Ramaphosa's office said it was disappointed by the claims and has demanded evidence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Thousands of migrants gathered at the US-Mexico border on Thursday night ahead of the midnight expiry of Title 42, a rule implemented by Donald Trump during the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: It allowed for immediate deportations of migrants who crossed the border irregularly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The presence of Department of Homeland Security patrols intensified in border towns like El Paso as the United States tried to persuade Latin American migrants fleeing their countries not to attempt to cross the border illegally. I want to be very clear our borders are not open. People who cross our border unlawfully and without a legal basis to remain will be promptly processed and removed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: From now on, Title VIII applies the rule that has historically governed migration in the United States.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: But, in addition, President Joe Biden's administration has announced new measures further restricting irregular access to asylum seekers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: But House Republicans are pushing for a tougher line, and on Thursday passed a sweeping bill to build more U.S.-Mexico border wall and impose new restrictions on asylum seekers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: At least 30 people have died in the Palestinian enclave as Israeli and Gaza militants enter

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: their fourth day of violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's the worst escalation the warring sides have seen in months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: One man was killed when a rocket fired from Gaza hit a building in the central Israeli city of Rehovot, the first fatality in Israel since the counter-terrorism operation began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ten Palestinian civilians were killed in attacks the UN have called unacceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: What we want to see is a halt to the fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: We are concerned about, deeply concerned and condemn all the civilian deaths that we're seeing, and it's important for all the parties involved to respect international law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israel claims to have killed two Palestinian militant commanders, Ali Hurali and Ahmed Abdou Dacha, top leaders from the armed wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihadists and the Al-Quads.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fighting continued on Thursday night despite Egyptian efforts to broker a ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Pakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan has been freed by a High Court in Islamabad following his arrest on corruption charges earlier this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: It follows Tuesday's Supreme Court ruling that, under the circumstances in which it happened, his detention was illegal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Khan was granted bail for two weeks, after which he is expected to appear in court again as part of the ongoing case.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: His release was celebrated by supporters across the country, though there were still some clashes with police of the kind sparked by his arrest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Khan was seized by police as he arrived at the High Court on Tuesday for a hearing in the ongoing case against him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Scuffles broke out as he was being detained and there were violent clashes across the country.

Αυτή η γενέρα διαφέρει σε πολλές τρόπες από τις προηγούμενες, αλλά επίσης εμπιστεύει τις δυσκολίες που έχουν μεταφέρει από μια δεκέδα φινάντια κρίσης και την κορονοβίουσια πανδημία.

sentences.sentence: Πρώτη φορά φέτος θα ψηφίσω.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Που είναι τα βασικά πράγματα για τα οποία πρέπει όλοι να ψηφίζουμε και για τα οποία πρέπει να αγωνιζόμαστε βασικά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Θα ψηφίσω με δικό μου κριτήριο και έχοντας ψάξει χρόνια και έχοντας κάνει σκέψεις.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Έχει ξεκινήσει ήδη η χώρα να έχει μια ανάκαμψη.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Θέλουμε να συνεχίσει και θα κάνουμε, πιστεύω ότι γενικότερα οι νέοι πρέπει να συμμετάσχουν σε αυτές τις εκλογές, διότι είναι το μέλλον της χώρας. Πρέπει το μέλλον αυτό να πάρουν τη κατάσταση στα χέρια τους.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Πρώτη φορά φέτος θα ψηφίσω για το συμφέρον της χώρας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Παρ' όλα αυτά το συμφέρον αυτή τη στιγμή θεωρώ ότι είναι να έχει σταθερή κυβέρνηση.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Δεν έχει να κάνει με τα προσωπικά κριτήρια αυτό και ότι θα ψηφίσουν και αυτά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Είναι όμως πιστεύω το ιδανικό για τη χώρα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ναι, θα ψηφίσουν οι εθνικές εκλογές.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
